name: First Person Enemy
description:
This is a first person turn based game, tribute to XCOM.

To win you must kill all of the enemies before you run out of health. You can only move a certain distance each turn. To harm the enemies you can use your gun or place landmines.

Controls:

ActionKeyboard and MouseGamepad (Xbox)MoveWASDLeft StickPlace BombRight ClickLeft TriggerShootLeft ClickRight TriggerQuitEscapeSelectSkip turnFX

This is a prototype as there are only a few levels.
